forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As twilight descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the evening air carries a crispness tempered by the lingering effects of coastal fog. Tonight's cloud cover hints at the gentle embrace of a low marine layer, with whispers of drizzle anticipated after 11 PM. The temperature settles around a mild 52 degrees, urging thoughtful wardrobe choices; a light jacket would cut the evening chill as a soft breeze brushes through, stirring the streets with the promise of a warmer day ahead.

Come morning, the city may greet you with a hint of morning drizzle before the sun embarks on its journey to disperse the clouds. The day reflects a fluctuating dynamic—partly sunny intervals will weave their way through, leaving the high near 60 to diminish as the afternoon rolls in. Gusts of wind whisper through the avenues, adding a playful chill; therefore, layering becomes the cornerstone of comfort—opt for a lightweight sweater topped with a windbreaker or perhaps a cozy scarf. With these conditions, a stroll through the neighborhood cafés, punctuated with the taste of warm pastries and invigorating coffee, would be a pleasant way to relish the unfolding day.
